content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: TSPARMCD
      operator: equal_to
      value: SNDCTVER
    - name: TSPARMCD
      operator: is_not_unique_set
      value:
        - DOMAIN
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.343
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when there is more than record with TSPARMCD=SNDCTVER
Outcome:
  Message: Only one record with TSPARMCD=SNDCTVER is allowed
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '343'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Only a single record should be provided in the Trial
                  Summary.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: 7.6.3
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TS

json.Description: Raise an error when there is more than record with TSPARMCD=SNDCTVER

Outcome.Message: Only one record with TSPARMCD=SNDCTVER is allowed

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Only a single record should be provided in the Trial Summary.
